comments.body: Should we also do it for each icon used in the NewProjectProvider? Like for `folder` ?

When testing it locally the only one I noticed that seemed not aligned was the GitHub icon. I just checked and changing the folder one doesn't seem to affect anything because it seems that we aren't adding an extra space for it when it's used. As far as I can tell, only the GitHub one needs to change here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +65,69 @@    override def check: String = "$(check) "
    override def findsuper: String = "$(arrow-up)"
    override def folder: String = "$(folder)"
    override def github: String = "$(github) "
  }
